entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a girl who tried to put the dragon into a trance using some sort of charm. She was able to extinguish her own skirt when it caught fire with water from her wand.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum did not think of flying and instead hit the dragon with a spell in its eye, causing it to go tramplining around and squashing some eggs.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry reached the edge of the enclosure with Ron and could see the five judges sitting at the other end.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron drew breath as he and Harry reached the edge of the enclosure.

entities.name: horntail
entities.description: The Horntail was taken away after being subdued by Krum's spell.

entities.name: eggs
entities.description: Some eggs were squashed by the dragon when it went tramplining around.

entities.name: judges
entities.description: The five judges were sitting at the other end of the enclosure in raised seats draped in gold.

relationships.description: Krum hit the dragon with a spell in its eye, causing it to go tramplining around and squashing some eggs.
Fleur's skirt caught fire when she tried to put the dragon into a trance using some sort of charm.
